archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Designs are not maintained or fully implemented
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
It’s part of an architect’s job to ensure that a design isn’t just a piece of paper but is something that is implemented and looked after over time. It’s very common for design to just be seen as a piece of paper that you just must do at the end of a project, and then for it to be left neglected over time.
It’s very common for what’s on the paper to not reflect reality because nobody takes responsibility for the design and its implementation in the long term.
